map_mission0.Name: Оглянути
map_mission0.Description: Тут є кілька папірців та невеличкий предмет.

map_tab1.Name: Нотатки
map_tab1.Description: I caught a Candle outside - he knows. The Candle died before I could find out more.

map_tab2.Name: Нотатки
map_tab2.Description: I have tried everything. I feel so cold. I just want to talk. I understand now - I regret it. I just want to apologize.

map_tab3.Name: Нотатки
map_tab3.Description: The construction of the portal is near complete. The demons have provided great manpower - we have snipers in a 5 mile radius around the old school building. Good luck getting in, reaper.

map_tab4.Name: Предмет
map_tab4.Description: Маленька металева запальничка. Здається, вона більше не працює.
